text: Montfaucon-d'Argonne is a commune in the Meuse department in Grand Est in north-eastern France. It is home to the Meuse-Argonne American Memorial. ==See also== * Communes of the Meuse department American Memorial. Ruined church at Montfaucon-d'Argonne. The blocky structure on the left is a German WWI observation post. ==References== Montfaucondargonne
title: Montfaucon-d'Argonne
